name: Annotation
description:
Annotation Time-Saver for you⚡️⚡️

Simply select on any text or group elements to create annotations!


  1. Simply click on one or two element, the plugin panel will preview what kind of annotation you can apply.
  2. Choose Fixed / Dynamic annotaiton so your team member can know exactly behavior.
  3. More Annotate feature coming soon! ✌️
